sentences.en: After the opening, maintaining Prev in 1705 - 1720 range concussion.
sentences.cn: 开盘后, 沪指维持在1705到 1720 区间震荡.

sentences.en: Another woman fell and suffered a concussion.
sentences.cn: 另一位妇女跌了一跤,得了脑震荡.

sentences.en: Clarke was left badly injured a concussion and covered with blood.
sentences.cn: 克拉克严重受伤,沾满了鲜血.

sentences.en: Concussion Blow ( Protection ) now causes damage based on attack power.
sentences.cn: 技能震荡猛击 ( 防护天赋加出 ) 现在按攻击强度一定比例造成伤害.

sentences.en: Concussion can also make a person feel very tired or angry.
sentences.cn: 脑震荡也会让人感觉非常疲惫,或者情绪易怒.

sentences.en: He was carried off the field with slight concussion.
sentences.cn: 他因轻微脑震荡给抬离了现场.

sentences.en: He was taken to hospital with concussion.
sentences.cn: 他因脑震荡被送进医院。

sentences.en: I had a concussion and a lot of scrapes and bruises.
sentences.cn: 我脑部遭受了震荡，还有许多擦伤和瘀伤。

sentences.en: Like other company, yahoo also gets the concussion of financial crisis.
sentences.cn: 像其他公司一样, 雅虎也受到金融危机的冲击.

sentences.en: Nicky was rushed to hospital with concussion.
sentences.cn: 尼基因脑震荡被火速送往医院。

sentences.en: Price of this week disk continues to carry concussion current.
sentences.cn: 本周硬盘价格继续保持震荡趋势.

sentences.en: Representative powers include concussion, matter agitation, and matter manipulation.
sentences.cn: 该系典型异能包括“冲击波” 、 “物质激灼”和“物质改造”.

sentences.en: She fell off a horse and suffered a concussion.
sentences.cn: 她从马上摔下来，造成了脑震荡。

sentences.en: The driver is in hospital with concussion.
You could receive a concussion from such a bump.
sentences.cn: 这样的疱可能会让你的脑震荡的.

trans.tran_en: a small amount of damage to the brain that makes you lose consciousness or feel sick for a short time, usually caused by something hitting your head
